Wool/agent.go.description: ValidationError pattern: struct with Field and Message strings, Error() returns "field: message", Validate() method returns *ValidationError or nil

Yarn/validation.go.description: ValidationError type created for Yarn package - struct with Field and Message strings, Error() method returns "field: message" format. Independent from but mirrors Wool/agent.go pattern.

Yarn/message.go.description: HiddenState.Validate() validates Vector non-empty, Layer >= 0, Shape consistency with Vector length, and DType in ValidDTypes (float32/float16). Nil HiddenState returns nil (valid). ValidDTypes is exported slice for dtype validation.

Yarn/message_test.go.description: Test file for Message and HiddenState validation. Uses Go table-driven tests pattern with t.Run() for subtests. Tests are comprehensive covering all validation rules for Message.Validate() and HiddenState.Validate(). Note: go test command not available in sandboxed environment - manual verification required.

Yarn/conversation.go.description: Conversation.Validate() validates ID, Name, CreatedAt (not zero), UpdatedAt (not before CreatedAt), and cascades validation to all Messages. Uses strconv.Itoa() for index formatting in error messages. Nested message errors use "messages[i].field" format.
